definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The gate to the sublime Dharma was therefore opened there.
sentences.chinese: 锡金正法之门在此开启。

sentences.english: In reality has India any business in Sikkim ?
sentences.chinese: 实际上，锡金又关印度什么事？

sentences.english: Pearlescent pewter with turquoise shimmer over a charcoal base.
sentences.chinese: 在炭灰色基调上闪耀着珠光锡金与绿松石光芒。

sentences.english: The name Gangtok, given to this capital of the Indian state of Sikkim, means “hilltop.”
sentences.chinese: 印度锡金邦的首府甘托克的名字是“山顶”的意思。

sentences.english: China has started incursions along the border with Sikkim.
sentences.chinese: 中国在锡金已经开始了入侵。

sentences.english: Did the King agree to it willingly?
sentences.chinese: 锡金国王欣然同意了吗？

sentences.english: Sikkim merged with India? Invaded and annexed by India is more like it.
sentences.chinese: 锡金并入印度？更像是被印度侵略和吞并。

definition: Ladakh, the eastern part of Jammu and Kashmir in northwest India, adjacent to Kashmir and Tibet, know as "Little Tibet"
Arunachal Pradesh, a state of India in the northeast of the country, occupying an area claimed by China in an ongoing sovereignty dispute
pinyin: A1 lu3 na4 qia4 er3 bang1

definition: Nathu La (Himalayan pass on Silk Road between Tibet and Indian Sikkim)
Line of Actual Control (LAC), separating Indian-controlled territory from Chinese-controlled territory
Aksai Chin, a disputed region in the Tibetan plateau
native state (term used by British Colonial power to refer to independent states of India or Africa)
